definition: the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: The backplane eliminates the necessity of wiring the card outputs together externally.
sentences.chinese: 采用背板的方式无需在外部通过接线连接插卡的输出。

sentences.english: A design of high speed backplane bus is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一个高速背板总线的设计尝试。

sentences.english: You can also use a laminated board, marble or glass surface.
sentences.chinese: 你可以先黏上面板或背板，随你的意。

sentences.english: The hard drive and memory module are both accessible via screw-secured access panels on the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 硬盘和内存模组都可以通过螺丝固定的背板轻松调整。

sentences.english: Referring to the Sachs VT5000 brake backplate.
The back board is provided with a bore, and the lamp cap extends out form the bore.
sentences.chinese: 在背板上设置有孔，所述灯头从所述孔伸出。

sentences.english: High-speed serial switch backplanes are at the heart of many communication systems.
sentences.chinese: 高速串行交换背板是很多通信系统的核心。

sentences.english: She unscrewed the back, fixed the mechanism and put it back together.
sentences.chinese: 她旋开背板，修好了机件，再将背板装回去。

sentences.english: She unscrewed the back, fixed the mechanism and put it back together.
sentences.chinese: 她旋开背板，修好了机件，再将背板装回去。

sentences.english: This backplate requires modification prior to installation on the steering knuckle.
sentences.chinese: 杠杆，这背板需要修改的背板安装前关节。

sentences.english: This backplate requires modification prior to installation on the steering knuckle.
sentences.chinese: 杠杆，这背板需要修改的背板安装前关节。

sentences.english: For some applications, it is necessary to disconnect a card from the analog back plane.
sentences.chinese: 对于有些应用，则必须从模拟背板断开某个插卡。

sentences.english: Percentage of revenue from backplane production.
sentences.chinese: 背板产品在营业收入中的比例？

sentences.english: I always do all together, at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 我就是同时把表背板黏在一起的。

sentences.english: It was shrink wrapped onto an acid-free backing board.
sentences.chinese: 当时这张广告被卷在一张无酸背板上。

definition: case, casing, cabinet or housing (of a computer, photocopier etc)
body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane
radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
(of a magnet) to attract metallic objects/(fig.) to exert a magnetic attraction (for investment, tourists etc)
acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
